00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PATH_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PATH_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include <QtGui/QPainterPath>
00034 
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 
00037 namespace mimas {
00038 
00043 class Path : public QPainterPath
00044 {
00045   QPainterPathStroker *stroker_;
00046 public:
00047   Path() : stroker_(NULL) {}
00048 
00049   Path(const QPainterPath &path)
00050    : QPainterPath(path),
00051      stroker_(NULL) {
00052     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("Path")
00053   }
00054 
00055   ~Path() {
00056     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("~Path")
00057     if (stroker_) {
00058       delete stroker_;
00059     }
00060   }
00061 
00066   Path outlineForWidth(float width) {
00067     if (!stroker_) {
00068       stroker_ = new QPainterPathStroker();
00069     }
00070     stroker_->setWidth(width);
00071     return Path(stroker_->createStroke(*this));
00072   }
00073 
00078   bool contains(float x, float y) {
00079     return QPainterPath::contains(QPointF(x, y));
00080   }
00081 };
00082 
00083 } // mimas
00084 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PATH_H_
